title: Deutsche Bank Risk and P&L platform wins two industry awards
body:
dbPalace, Deutsche Bank’s strategic Risk and P&L production platform for the Corporate & Investment Bank, has won two awards in quick succession.
The platform, which has over 1,000 users, was recognised at the recent Financial Innovation Awards winning ‘Best Fintech Partnership’ alongside GFT. In particular, the award recognised the agile techniques the combined team followed to speed up release times, reduce IT costs and enable the bank to react quickly to customer and market demands.
This accolade was followed up with an award for Best Treasury and Capital Markets project at the Banking Technology Awards. Deutsche Bank beat strong competition as the IT project was acknowledged as the best in the industry in 2017.
